name: Living Legends: Frozen Beauty (Full)
description:
Unlock the complete adventure with a single purchase! No in-app purchases!

The Queen has chosen your sister as her successor, but are her promises too good to be true? There are many secrets awaiting you in the castle, but the biggest dangers lie beneath the icy mountain passes.

• EXPERIENCE A NEW TWIST ON A CLASSIC TALE
Snow White will guide you in your quest to save your sister. Learn her history as you travel through the queen’s castle.

• SAVE YOUR SISTER!
You’ve taken care of your sister since your mother’s death, but now she’s in danger. It’s up to you to find her and ensure her safety.

• CAN YOU DEFEAT THE EVIL QUEEN?
The queen has been maintaining her youth by tricking beautiful young women into entering her lair so she can steal their life forces.

• ENTER A MAGNIFICENT WORLD BY UNLOCKING THIS COLLECTOR'S EDITION
Meet a mysterious Alchemist in the bonus game. Take a step behind the scenes with re-playable puzzles and cut-scenes in this lovely Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure!

• Find thousands of hidden objects, plus solve tons of mini games and puzzles!
• Unlock this incredible Collector's Edition to gain access to all of the amazing bonuses and additional gameplay!
